Name: I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter
About the game: I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter is a top-down shooter. Kill your enemies, complete missions and learn the story of the main character. Revolvers, shotguns, dynamite and even machine guns you can use in battle. 24 dynamic missions will not let you get bored and relax. Be sure - this game will challenge you! See if you can kill them all! Stylish graphics; Dynamic skirmishes Ability to ride a horse Boss shooting Timed Survival Mode
